name: Bog Slime
description: When a spell with [consume] is played, gain 1[corrupt].
relicLoreTooltips: The bogs and decay on the Ring’s topside acts as a sort of camouflage for those within and a deterrent from anyone wanting to investigate further. I’ve seen bodies decomposed in minutes on more than one occasion. So, I wouldn’t say I was excited to return to the bogs for any reason.

additionalTooltips.title: Consume
additionalTooltips.description: Can only be played once per battle.

additionalTooltips.title: Charged Echoes
additionalTooltips.description:
Add [corrupt] by playing [infused] cards. The Wurmkin use [corrupt] to power spells and abilities.

[corrupt] can exceed [emptycorrupt] but excess [corrupt] will be removed at end of turn.
